title: Mediocredito Centrale|Invitalia
snippet: Mediocredito Centrale - Banca del Mezzogiorno was acquired by Invitalia in August 2017 to develop synergies with the offer of incentives to enterprises and to promote growth policies.

title: Banca del Mezzogiorno – MedioCredito Centrale - Wikipedia
snippet: Banca del Mezzogiorno – MedioCredito Centrale (BdM-MCC) is an Italian bank based in Rome, Lazio region. The bank is entirely controlled by Invitalia S.p.A., which in turn is owned by the Ministry of Economy. The bank was specialized in medium-term loan to companies, which developed into corporate ...

title: Invitalia: l'Agenzia nazionale per lo sviluppo d'impresa - Invitalia
snippet: Banca del Mezzogiorno – Mediocredito Centrale BdM-MCC was acquired by Invitalia in August 2017 to generate synergies by providing incentives in support of enterprises and to promote growth policies.

title: Banca del Mezzogiorno - MedioCredito Centrale - Wikipedia
snippet: Banca del Mezzogiorno - MedioCredito Centrale S.p.A. è un istituto bancario italiano, partecipato al 100% da Invitalia. MedioCredito Centrale nasce nel 1952, istituito dalla Legge 949/52 emanata dal Governo De Gasperi VI, come ente pubblico ...

title: Mediocredito Centrale: le nuove nomine del Consiglio di Amministrazione - Invitalia
